channel.title: Local Governance on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS
channel.description: Recent content in Local Governance on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS

item.title: QField for Community Mapping and Local Governance
item.description:
What you can do

  • Community issue mapping
  • Service access and planning
  • Participatory planning and reporting

Integrated with QGIS and QFieldCloud

Design projects in QGIS and collaborate securely via QFieldCloud.
